serverInterval
propertiesMeta.description: Sets the interval for the ADS state subscription in milliseconds. This might be expensive performance wise, so do not set to a very low value.

propertiesMeta.name: serverDomain
propertiesMeta.description: The domain of the ADS extension in the server. Defaults to 'ADS'.

propertiesMeta.name: stateImages
propertiesMeta.description: A structure defining an image for each state the control can have and the fallback image.
